alert.note: Alert for Hickman; Maury; Williamson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 11:26AM CDT until August 12 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Maury County in Middle Tennessee... Central Williamson County in Middle Tennessee... Northeastern Hickman County in Middle Tennessee... * Until noon CDT. * At 1126 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Fairview, or 15 miles east of Centerville, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Franklin, Columbia, Centerville, Spring Hill, Thompson`s Station, Santa Fe, Bon Aqua, Primm Springs, Leipers Fork, Lyles and I-65 East Of Columbia. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 45 and 63. Interstate 840 between mile markers 6 and 36. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
